thread.title: High Hopes for GSB Soft Loan Scheme for SMEs – 8 Oct 2015
thread.title_full: High Hopes for GSB Soft Loan Scheme for SMEs – 8 Oct 2015

author: centennial
title: High Hopes for GSB Soft Loan Scheme for SMEs – 8 Oct 2015
text: Home › The Asian Pulse › Daily News › High Hopes for GSB Soft Loan Scheme for SMEs – 8 Oct 2015 High Hopes for GSB Soft Loan Scheme for SMEs – 8 Oct 2015 Thursday, October 8th, 2015 Almost THB10bn of the Government Savings Bank’s (GSB) THB100bn soft loan for SMEs has been approved just three weeks after the scheme started. The approved amount is expected to reach THB40-50bn by the end of Oct and the entire THB100bn will be approved by end 2015, president Chatchai Payuhanaveechai said. Under the scheme, state-controlled bank extends the soft loans to commercial and other state-run banks at 0.1% interest, which they relend to SMEs at 4% rate. The rapid loan approvals bode well for SMEs floundering amid the lacklustre economy and weak purchasing power without the scheme, SMEs would have struggled to get fresh loans to help with liquidity as banks have become reluctant to lend to them for fearing higher bad loans. Even SMEs whose debt had already been restructured are able to borrow the soft loans, as the Finance Ministry hopes their debt could turn back to performing loans after they receive the loans, and this could ease the banks’ non-performing loans.
